dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on bold and potentially high-risk challenges with enthusiasm.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the risks and consider alternatives before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Sense of Humor
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle difficult situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will often use humor to diffuse tension and make light of a situation.
Your FarTwin may employ sarcasm as a defense mechanism or to critique situations.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin prioritizes saving and frugality, seeking to minimize unnecessary expenses.
Your FarTwin tends to prioritize spending and indulging in luxuries when resources allow.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin tends to see the world as a single, interconnected system and seeks to understand diverse perspectives.
Your FarTwin prioritizes national interests over global concerns and may be skeptical of international cooperation.

dimensions.label: Social Connections
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin form relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin is naturally sociable and enjoys meeting new people, forming connections with ease.
Your FarTwin prefers quieter environments and may need time to warm up to new social interactions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning?

options.description: Your FarTwin tends to analyze and break down complex information into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin is more likely to explore new concepts through hands-on experience or intuition.

dimensions.label: Physical Activity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize physical health?

options.description: Your FarTwin tends to value intense physical activity and exercise as a way to improve themselves.
Your FarTwin prioritizes maintaining a healthy lifestyle, but doesn't necessarily push themselves to extreme levels of physical exertion.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin tends to express their opinions clearly and assertively, even in confrontational situations.
Your FarTwin may shy away from conflict or try to diffuse tense situations with tact rather than confrontation.
